option.name: notice
option.value:
Copyright (c) $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-", "$today.year")$today.year. This code was made by copy-paste and some monkey typing.
The most significant parts are taken from the «Now Hiring» plugin by slushman (https://github.com/slushman/now-hiring), the «WordPress Boilerplate» by DevinVinson (https://github.com/DevinVinson/WordPress-Plugin-Boilerplate) and the «Authorize.net - Simple Donations» by Aman Verma (https://twitter.com/amanverma217).
